metadata.description: A comprehensive collection of Claude Code plugins for enhanced development workflows, context engineering, git management, and documentation

plugins.name: context-engineering
plugins.description: Advanced context engineering workflow with PRP generation, execution orchestration, GitHub issue analysis, and skills for PRP templates and issue analysis

plugins.name: development-workflow
plugins.description: Comprehensive development toolkit with senior engineering, code review, architecture advisory, PR management, and skills for code quality, security, and testing

plugins.name: git-project-management
plugins.description: Git worktree management and project planning utilities with skills for git workflow best practices and commit conventions

plugins.name: documentation-templates
plugins.description: Templates and examples for creating comprehensive project documentation with skills for documentation patterns and README guidelines
